data.titulo: From Design to Code // HTML & CSS from scratch // Frontend Mentor
data.descripcion: Taking on a Frontend Mentor challenge to explore how I go from design to code, including breaking down some of my thought processes along the way. This project is a fun exploration of flexbox, grid, custom properties, and variable fonts, to name a few things.
